poem:
The Allure of Ephemeral Fortune

In the whir of digits,  
a glint of gold  
surges skyward—  
hopes pegged on vapor.  
Brief euphoria,  
as the pulse of the market  
beats beneath  
futures imagined.  
Dream-traders  
in a dance with shadows,  
their fortunes  
rising with the sun,  
only to set again  
in whispered promises  
of tomorrow.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. Bitcoin reached a record high of $87,198, before slipping back slightly on Monday. The price more than". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
